SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.ui.image

Class RichImage

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Image
java.awt.image.BufferedImage
civitas.celestis.ui.image.RichImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
RenderedImage, WritableRenderedImage, Transparency
public class RichImage extends BufferedImage
An image which natively supports the use of RichColor.

      public RichImage(@Nonnull IntMatrix data)
      Creates a new image. Note that this constructor can be very slow with large matrices.
      Parameters:
      data - The matrix containing the RGB integer values

  • Method Details

    • getPoint

      @Nonnull public NaturalVector2 getPoint(double x, double y)
      Returns a point on this image. The provided scale factor is applied to the width and height this image.
      Parameters:
      x - The X position of the point to get on a scale of 0-1
      y - The Y position of the point to get on a scale of 0-1
      Returns:
      The requested position on this image

    • getPoint

      @Nonnull public NaturalVector2 getPoint(@Nonnull Vector2 scale)
      Returns a point on this image. The provided scale factor is applied to the width and height this image.
      Parameters:
      scale - The vector containing the X and Y scales between 0-1
      Returns:
      The requested position on this image
